message.body: Hey Adam. What is the story with tiling? My classes start tomorrow. I got class Monday and Thursday. I could finish tiling on Tuesday and Wednesday if needed
Yeah just grouting needs to be done by then. The window wall isn't finished yet bc don't know details still on window
Haven't heard anything about them yet. Supposed to come in to NJ cherry hill tmrw but not sure when they're getting to the house. I was assuming Tuesday for floor tile
